game.name: Zombie 3D Survival Offline
game.description:
What will happen if you are sent to a world that is full of blood-thirsty zombies? Do you think that you are blessed with strong fighting abilities? Practicing your aggression in the real world can cost you heavy, but it takes nothing when you try them in the virtual platform. For this reason, we have brought to you a brand new action packed challenge where you find yourself in a world invaded by a horde of zombies. We know that you are daring enough to tackle this situation. 
Join Zombie 3D: Survival Offline game and be prepared to play against the undead! Forget about building some classy and epic buildings in the classy and legendary pixel environment and get ready to face off the situation you have never imagined ever! In this one of the best zombie games for kids, you slept at ten oâ€™ clock in the eve, but could not wake up in the morning. Yes, in the middle of night, you have reached to the realm of dreams and you find there nothing, but a huge group of bad souls- zombies. 
Grab your gun and shoot them as fast as you can as these creatures can walk slowly! Keep killing these deadly zombies and completing mission after mission to prove yourself as the biggest survival on this planet in this html5 zombie survival game! These monsters look very scary and realistic at many instances. Choose from different weapons including pistols, sub machine guns, machine guns or epic rocket launchers and survive the zombie apocalypse like never before in this 3D first person shooter! Play more zombie games online for free, no download required on atmegame.com!!
